Question:Characters:
Character 0
Name: Mia Fey
Description: Chief Attorney at Fey & Co.. My boss, and a very good defense attorney.
Character 1
Name: Maya Fey
Description: Mia's little sister. Found bent over her sister's body, crying.
Character 2
Name: Dick Gumshoe
Description: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.
Character 3
Name: Miles Edgeworth
Description: A gifted prosecutor, and a ruthless man who'd do anything to get a "guilty" verdict.
Character 4
Name: April May
Description: An eye witness to the events. Testifies that she saw Maya commit the murder.
Character 5
Name: Marvin Grossberg
Description: A veteran defense attorney, and Mia's mentor.
Character 6
Name: Bellboy
Description: Bellboy at the Gatewater Hotel.
Character 7
Name: Redd White
Description: An eye witness. CEO of the information gathering company, Bluecorp.
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: No one would believe I was a defense attorney if I didn't carry this.
Evidence 1
Name: The Thinker
Description: The murder weapon. Looks like a statue, but it's actually a clock. Made by Larry Butz. Clock in the form of a statue. The clock's gears have been removed. Made by Larry Butz.
Evidence 2
Name: Glass Shards
Description: The broken remains of a glass light stand. Broken beyond all recognition.
Evidence 3
Name: Receipt
Description: A department store receipt with letters written in blood on the back. Receipt for a glass light stand. The date of purchase is the day before the murder.
Evidence 4
Name: Maya's Memo
Description: "A conversation I had with my sister is recorded on my cell phone."
Evidence 5
Name: Mia's Autopsy Report
Description: Time of death: 9/5 at 9:00PM. Cause: single blunt force trauma. Death was instantaneous. Died from a blow by a blunt object. May have lived for a few minutes after being hit.
Evidence 6
Name: Maya's Cell Phone
Description: Holds a conversation between the Chief and Maya. Click here for details.
Evidence 7
Name: Wiretap
Description: Found in Miss May's hotel room.
Evidence 8
Name: Floor Plans
Description: The murder scene, the Fey & Co. Law Offices. Click here for details.
Evidence 9
Name: May Testimony
Description: "The victim dodged an attack then ran to the right, but she was caught and struck."
Evidence 10
Name: Photograph
Description: On the back the words "DL-6 Incident - Exhibit A" are written in pencil.
Evidence 11
Name: Photograph
Description: On the back the words "DL-6 Incident - Exhibit B" are written in pencil.
Evidence 12
Name: Bellboy's Affidavit
Description: Describes the man who stayed with Miss May in the hotel on the night of the murder.
Evidence 13
Name: Newspaper Clipping
Description: Article about politician's suicide. The word "White" is written in pen at the top.
Evidence 14
Name: Mia's Memo
Description: A list of people's names in Mia's handwriting.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: I did see everything! I did!
Person: April
Testimony 1
Testimony: The victim--the woman--dodged the first attack and ran off to the right.
Person: April
Testimony 2
Testimony: Then the girl in the hippie clothes ran after her...
Person: April
Testimony 3
Testimony: And she hit her with that weapon! I saw it! I did!
Person: April
Testimony 4
Testimony: That... that clock! Um... the kinda statue-y clock? "The Thinker," I think?
Person: April
